mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_qna_reply (qna_no, reply_content, reply_type, create_date) VALUES (#{qnaNo}, #{replyContent}, 'USER', current_timestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT r.reply_no, r.qna_no, r.admin_id, r.reply_content, r.reply_type, r.create_date, q.member_id FROM tb_qna_reply r LEFT JOIN tb_qna q on r.qna_no = q.qna_no WHERE r.qna_no = #{qnaNo} ORDER BY create_date
